frontmatter.title: Switch
frontmatter.description: Switch is used to toggle between two states - ON and OFF.

internal.content:
--- title: Switch description: Switch is used to toggle between two states - ON and OFF. tabs: ["Usage"] showMobile: true --- Switch is used to toggle between two states in a user interface - ON and OFF, hence resembling the real-life switch that is used to turn something ON or OFF. ### States The switch comes in **2 selection states** - ON and OFF. And each of these states can have **3 interactive states** - default, active and disabled. #### ON ![States for ON switch](./images/switch-1.png)
#### OFF ![States for OFF switch](./images/switch-2.png)
### Usage #### Switch vs. Checkbox
Switch Checkbox
Selection & execution at the same time Just selection as execution requires another control
Instant response Explicit action is required to confirm the response
Best to use independently Best to use in forms


![A page where instant response is required: (Left) Switch vs (Right) Checkbox](./images/switch-3.png)

![A form where an explicit action is required to confirm/submit the response: (Left) Checkbox vs (Right) Switch](./images/switch-4.png)
